modName: Rezerect Skyrim Towns - Villages - Farms - IVARSTEAD
summary:
Rezerect Skyrim - Towns, Villages and Farms Series 
Many mods have focused on large cities (Whiterun, Sloitude, Riften, etc.) but the Towns, Villages and Farms have been left out of the loop (Ivarstead, Rorikstead, etc.). I plan to fix that!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8483/8200302197_56d4635d29_c.jpg[/img]

[size=4][color=Red][b]Rezerect Ivarstead[/color][/b][/size]
[color=yellow]CHANGES INCLUDE:
- Added lighting in the form of lanterns
- Added MANY trees and other foliage
- Added campfire with bench
- Added a Statue of Talos, which appears to have been forgotten about (moss and bushes)
- Added more chickens (everyone loves chickens)
- Added misc. pieces such as barrels, crates, etc.[/color]

Rezerect Skyrim - Towns, Villages and Farms Series 

Many mods have focused on large cities (Whiterun, Sloitude, Riften, etc.) but the Towns, Villages and Farms have been left out of the loop (Ivarstead, Rorikstead, etc.). I plan to fix that!

The Rezerect Skyrim - Towns, Villages and Farms Series aims to add beauty to each and every Town, Village and Farm in Skyrim; making each of them unique. There is also a focus on FPS; I do not plan to add SOOO MUCH detail that it will impact FPS a great deal; just enough to make an impact on your experiences!

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8488/8200302747_e01ceddd12_c.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8340/8201394702_23a743c89a_c.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8202/8200302963_c01a2766ea_c.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8208/8200303019_ea1ca24274_c.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8488/8201395138_64c93967e1_c.jpg[/img]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8199/8200301903_565e6da915_c.jpg[/img]

[size=4][color=red] Compatibility[/color][/size]
Should be compatible with any and all mods that do not alter Ivarstead (Structures, Animals, etc.)
Any and all lighting mods (ENB, COT, etc.) will work with this no problem.

[size=4][color=red]Load Order[/color][/size]
Since it is a new mod, Wyrebash and BOSS wont recognize it, so you will have to manually move it in your mod order. Make sure ANY AND ALL Rezerect Skyrim Towns - Villages - Farms Mods are loaded with other City, Town, Villages, Mod (no particular order). Do not put it at the end of your mod list, this will cause issues.

Here is part of my load order:

•	dD - Enhanced Blood Main.esp Active
•	dD-Dawnguard-EBT Patch.esp Active
•	dD - Easy Lift Bodies and Objects - Light Only.esp Active
•	RiverwoodEnhancedPlugin.esp Active
•	[color=yellow]Rezerect_Ivarstead.esp Active ***********************************[/color]
•	TAVESolitude.esp Active
•	TAVEWindhelm.esp Active
•	dD - Realistic Ragdoll Force - Reduced.esp Active
•	Apocalypse - The Spell Package.esp Active

Etc.

[size=4][color=red]Other Mods[/color][/size]
Check out my ENB, Rezerect Skyrim V3, which was used to take all pictures shown here.
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25616]Rezerect Skyrim ENB[/url]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25616
author: Steamin661
